title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The code does not sanitize or validate the input before using it to create a shortcut. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands into the arguments passed to the application.
fix: Validate and sanitize all user inputs before using them in system calls or command execution.

reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could inject a malicious argument like '/autostart; rm -rf /' to delete files on the system.
